data.title: Gabriella Wilde Biography
data.meta_description: Date of Birth: 1989, April 19 Years: 31 years Nation of birth: England Height: 5 feet 10 inches Name Gabriella Wilde Dad John Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe
data.text:
Date of Birth: 1989, April 19 Years: 31 years Nation of birth: England Height: 5 feet 10 inches Name Gabriella Wilde Dad John Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe Mother Vanessa Mary Theresa Llewellyn Hubbard Nationality British Place of birth / city Basingstoke ethnicity White Profession Model Net worth $4 million eye color Blue Hair color Blonde body measurements 34-25-35 weight in kg 58 KILOGRAMS Married Yes Married to Alan Pownall (d. 2014) Kids Sasha Blue Pownall Education Heathfield St Mary’s School Awards Not yet Films squats tv show doctor who Brothers Isabella Calthorpe, Olivia Llewellyn, Arabella Llewellyn

Gabriella Wilde is an English model and actress known for her appearances in various movies and television series. She has acted in numerous movies and television series, including The Three Musketeers, Carrie, and Endless Love. She currently appears on the television show Poldark alongside Aiden Turner, Eleanor Tomlinson, Ruby Bentall and other stars.

Early life and education of Gabriella Wilde

Gabriella Wilde was born on April 8, 1989 with her birth name Gabriella Zanna Vanessa. She is also known by her name as Anstruther Gough Calthorpe. Wilde was born in Basingstoke, Hampshire of England and her nationality is English and her ethnicity is Caucasian.

She is the daughter of John Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe and Vanessa Hubbard. Her father was a businessman and also a former president of the Watermark Group. Her mother is the ex-wife of the socialite Sir Dai Llewellyn, 4th Baronet. Her mother is a former model who has represented David Bailey and John Swannell.

Wilde has a younger sister, Octavia, as well as five half-siblings: Olivia and Arabella Llewellyn, from her mother’s first marriage, and Georgiana, Isabella and Jacobi, from her father’s first marriage, to Lady Mary-Gaye Curzon.

She is also ‘unofficial half-sisters’ to Pandora Cooper-Key and Cressida Bonas, the other daughters of Lady Mary-Gaye. Isabella, Olivia and Cressida are also actresses.

Wilde attended Heathfield St. Mary’s School, Ascot and St Swithun’s School, Winchester. She left her education to pursue an art course while continuing her modeling career. She smuggled vodka to Heathfield, resulting in a suspension and a transfer to St Swithun’s. She studied fine art at the City and Guilds of London Art School, but dropped out to pursue acting.

Gabriella Wilde Career

From the early age of 14, Wilde began her career working as a model and was also discovered within the industry by Naomi Campbell.

Wilde was also introduced to Premier Model Management and started working on it. She also took a cover shoot for the magazines and also worked within the campaign organized by the modeling agency.

Immediately after completing her modeling career, she also joined the film industry in St. Trinian’s 2: The Legend of Fritton’s Gold and this was an adventure film that came out in December 2009.

From that very moment, his career within the film industry also entered with the great success of the film. In 2016, she was cast in a new TV series. Poldark. Poldark is currently broadcast on BBC One HD .

Gabriella Wilde net worth

Gabriella Wilde’s net worth is estimated to be $4 million. She earns almost $500k a year from her acting career plus $100k from the endorsement amount.

He has appeared in films such as St Trinian’s; 2 The Legend of Fritton’s Gold, The Three Musketeers, II Maestro, Carrie, Endless Love, Squatters and many TV shows like Doctor Who, Dark Horse and Poldark.

He appeared in the 2011 film The Three Musketeers alongside Orlando Bloom and Logan Leman. The film was released in October 2011 and earned over $132 million at the box office.

Wilde stands at a height of 5ft 10inches and his weight is 58kg with his best stance and posture and attractiveness in his posing styles. She is active on Instagram with thousands of followers.

Gabriella Wilde Personal Life

Wilde is a married woman. She has been married to Alan Pownall since 2014. She is happy with her spouse and her children. Her husband is a musician and they were married on September 13, 2014. The couple have two children.

She gave birth to their first child, Sasha Blue Pownall on February 3, 2014. They welcomed their second child named Shiloh Silva Pownall in 2016.

There is no past information on her divorce by looking at her biography and her profile is much more focused on her career than her personal life. Gabriella is very decent in nature to her and is an animal lover.
